tiralabra

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • tiralabra.Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable

    public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable
    The node used in creating the Huffman tree. Implements Comparable so that the nodes can be placed in order in the priority queue.
